ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ حَسْبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: O Prophet! Allah is enough for you, and for the muminun who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God is sufficient for you, O Prophet, and the faithful who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Prophet! Allah is sufficient for you and the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Prophet, God and the believers who follow you are sufficient support for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O Herald of the Hidden! Allah is Sufficient for you and for all these Muslims who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Prophet! Allah is sufficient for you and for the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Prophet! Allah is sufficient for you and (for) such of the believers as follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Prophet, God suffices thee, and the believers who follow thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O Prophet! Allah is Sufficient for thee and those who follow thee of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O Prophet! God is sufficient for you and the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Prophet! sufficient unto thou is Allah and those who follow thee of believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O Prophet! Sufficient for you is Allah and those of the faithful who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O Prophet! sufficient unto thee is Allah,- (unto thee) and unto those who follow thee among the Believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O Prophet (Muhammad SAW)! Allah is Sufficient for you and for the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Prophet, Allah suffices you and whosoever follows you of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O prophet! Count on God, and on the believers who have followed you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O Prophet, sufficient for you is Allah and for whoever follows you of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:64] O Prophet, God suffices you, and the believers who follow you, suffice you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (O Prophet! Allah is sufficient for thee and those who follow thee of the believers) the Aws and the Khazraj.
